Class Truck

  • java.lang.Object
    • Truck
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Truck
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The trucks perform the following sequence: Read from their input buffer until they have received 4 deliveries or receive notification that there are no more deliveries. On each delivery, they must append the truck number for tracking purposes. For each of the four deliveries (or less if the "no more deliveries" notification was received), do the following: Sleep for 0-10 seconds. This period must be decided randomly. Print out the information on the shipping order to the screen The truck also must also print out a message to the screen after it has received the -no more deliveries- notification and delivered its last order indicating that it is done delivering. This message should specify the truckâ€™s number and the number of its associated shipping center. The Shipping order information printed to the screen must include the following information: Delivery address Name on order Item ordered Item category Shipping Center the order went through Shipping Center Section the order went through Delivery Truck the order was delivered on
